queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.html_url" as link
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| formatDate(step_started_epoch, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as execution_time
| tourl(link, run_name) as run_link
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
| where step_result matches "{{step_result}}"
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| count by execution_time, run_link, step_name, step_number, step_result, job_name, duration_seconds
| fields - _count

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.html_url" as link
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| formatDate(step_started_epoch, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as execution_time
| tourl(link, run_name) as run_link
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
| where step_result in ("failure")
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| count by execution_time, run_link, step_name, step_number, step_result, job_name, duration_seconds
| fields - _count
| sort by execution_time
| limit 10

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.html_url" as link
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| formatDate(step_started_epoch, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as execution_time
| tourl(link, run_name) as run_link
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
| where step_result matches "{{step_result}}"
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| count by execution_time, run_link, step_name, step_number, step_result, job_name, duration_seconds
| fields - _count
| sort by duration_seconds
| limit 20

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
| where step_result matches "{{step_result}}"
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| sum(duration_seconds) as step_duration_seconds by run_name, step_name
| order by step_duration_seconds
| limit 20    
| transpose row run_name  column step_name

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
| where step_result matches "{{step_result}}"
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| avg(duration_seconds) as avg_duration_seconds by step_name
| sort by avg_duration_seconds
| limit 10

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
| where step_result matches "{{step_result}}"
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| avg(duration_seconds) as avg_duration_seconds by step_name, job_name
| transpose row job_name column step_name

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.name" as job_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.steps" as steps
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_name" as run_name
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.html_url" as link
| json field=_raw "repository.name" as repo_name
| parse regex field = steps "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi
| json field=json_added_blob "name", "status", "conclusion", "number", "started_at", "completed_at" as step_name, step_status, step_result, step_number, step_started_at, step_completed_at nodrop
| parseDate(step_started_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_started_epoch
| parseDate(step_completed_at, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") as step_completed_epoch
| step_completed_epoch - step_started_epoch as ms_step_duration
| ms_step_duration/1000 as duration_seconds
| formatDate(step_started_epoch, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as execution_time
| tourl(link, run_name) as run_link
| where action = "completed"
| where !isNull(gh_action) 
//| where step_result in ("failure")
| where step_result matches "{{step_result}}"
| where job_name matches "{{job_name}}"
| where step_name matches "{{step_name}}"
| where run_name matches "{{run_name}}"
| where repo_name matches "{{repository}}"
| count_distinct (run_name) as count by job_name
| sort by count

_sourceCategory="github" 
| json field=_raw "workflow_job.runner_group_name" as gh_action
